metadata.title: CVE-2016-6718 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: An elevation of privilege vulnerability in the Account Manager Service inAndroid 7.0 before 2016-11-01 could enable a local malicious application toretrieve sensitive information without user interaction. This issue israted as Moderate because it is a local bypass of user interactionrequirements (access to functionality that would normally require eitheruser initiation or user permission.) Android ID: A-30455516.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
